title: Long-Term Memory Enhancement Strategy Using Concept Mapping in CLIL Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic CLIL (Content and Language Integrated Learning) pedagogy, mastery of mathematical content knowledge, and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service teachers to cultivate competencies in designing and applying mathematics concept instruction in L2 learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core strategies for enhancing long-term memory (node hierarchization, visual connection emphasis, prior knowledge integration) when designing concept maps in a CLIL environment
Learners can visualize mathematical problem-solving processes as concept maps and propose methods to reduce cognitive load for L2 learners
Learners can derive revised concept maps based on formative assessment results and demonstrate an 80%+ accuracy achievement rate

resources: Mathematics CLIL (Content and Language Integrated Learning) sample materials

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
